DragWords is your perfect tool for mastering vocabulary! Simply drag any word from a webpage, and easily add it to your personalized word deck. No hassle, just smooth and efficient word collection.

How to use

1 While reading online, when you come across an unfamiliar word, simply drag it. You can then translate the word and add it to your word deck.

2 Create your own personalized word deck and study the words youâ€™ve added. You can organize them into difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, and Hard.

3 Choose your translation language from 14 available options and set review cycles for each level of difficulty to optimize your learning.
